name: Discord Rich Presence (Rust)
author: Navidrome Team
description: Discord Rich Presence integration for Navidrome - Rust implementation

users.reason: To process scrobbles on behalf of users

http.reason: To communicate with Discord API for gateway discovery and image uploads

scheduler.reason: To schedule heartbeat messages and activity clearing
